maqras.text: 94|3|geudaeui deung-e issneun geu jeom-eun mugeoun geos-ieossnola
95|4|hananim-eun ingan-eul jeil aleumda un hyeongsang-eulo bich-eusin hu
95|6|geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun uiloun jadeul-eun je-oedoeeo geudeul-ege neun kkeunh-im-eobsneun bosang-i issnola
95|7|dagaol simpan-ui nal-e gwanhayeo geudaeleul bujeonghaneun iyuneun mueos-inyo
96|5|ingan-i alji moshaneun geosdo gi leuchyeo jusyeossnola
96|10|geuneun balo gidohaneun hananim ui jong-eul banghaehayeossnola
96|12|animyeon sin-ang-e gyeong-geonhala myeong lyeong-eul bad-assda saeng-gaghaneunyo
96|14|hananimkkeseo jikyeo bosim-eul geu neun alji moshaneunyo
96|15|geulo hayeogeum alge halini geuga dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon geuui apmeo lileul kkeul-eogalila
96|17|geuleon hu geulo hayeogeum geuleul doul donglyodeul-eul bulleo moige hago
96|18|hananim-eun geuege daleun eungbeol ui cheonsadeul-eul buleulila
96|19|geuleomeulo geuleul ttaleuji malla buboghayeo gyeongbaehago hananimkke gakka i hala
97|2|geojughan bam-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
97|3|geolughan i bam-eun cheongaewolboda deo hullyunghan bam-eulo
97|4|i bam-e cheonsadeulgwa gabeuliel cheonsaga junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul bad-a ganglim hayeo
97|5|achim dongnyeok-kkaji meomuleumyeo pyeong-an hasoseo lago insahadeola
98|1|seongseoui baegseongdeul gaunde jinli leul geoyeoghan jadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eun bun myeonghan yejeung-i geudeul-ege ileul ttae kkaji geudeul-eun gil-eul tteonalyeo haji ani hayeossnola
98|2|i yejeung-eun seongseuleoun malsseum-eul nangsonghal hananim-ui seonjijalo
98|4|seongseoui baegseongdeul-eun geudeul-ege bunmyeonghan yejeung-i ileul ttae kkaji uigyeon-euldallihaji ani haess-euni
98|5|geudeul-ege jueojin myeonglyeong-eun ha nanim-eul gyeongbaehago jinsilhan mid-eum-i doedolog geubunkke heonsinhamyeo gidoleul deuligo iseullamseleul bachineun geosdeul-ichamdoen sin-ang-ila
98|6|sillo seongseoui baegseongdeul jung-e jin lileul geoyeoghan jadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eun buljiog-e issge doelini geudeul-eun geu an-eseo yeongjuhamae gajang saaghan mu lideul-ila
98|7|geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul silcheonhaneun jadeul-eun gajang uiloun jadeullo

98|8|geudeul-eul wihae junim-ui bosang-i issnani mit-eulo gangmul-i heuleuneun yeong saenghal eden-ui cheongug-ila hananim-eun geudeullo gippeohasigo geudeul-eun geubun-eulo gippeohalini geugeos-eun junim-eul du lyeowohaneun ja-e daehan bosang-ila
99|6|geunal salamdeul-eun yeogi jeogi mudeom-eseo ttejieo nawa geudeul-ui eobjeogdeul-eulboinola
99|7|tikkeulmanhan seon-ilado silcheonhan ja neun geugeos-i bog-i doem-eul al geos-imyeo
99|8|tikkeulmanhan ag-ilado jeojileun ja neun geugeos-i ag-i doem-eul allila
100|7|ingan-eun geuga haenghan geos-eul jeung-eon hal geos-imae
